Last Friday 6th grade taught us what it means to S.O.A.R. like geese. When geese fly in a V formation, they improve the overall efficiency of the flock by 71%! When a goose at the front of the V formation gets tired, it moves to the end and another goose takes the lead. Geese also honk to encourage each other. S.O.A.R. stands for:
Synergy
On task
Aware
Responsibility
